title: Finding Button
description:
Use POST Player endpoint to update X and Y values of the player. 
You can find button's coordinates by hovering with your mouse

helpo.message: Now it is time to create yourself by using your first endpoint
Do not worry, it is nothing complicated
Click on the Pipeman on top of your screen select PUT type and write 'Player' in the endpoint name
In the body, specify your name, x and y coordinates
